title: Project Planning Template
description: Create project plans that actually get followed. Break down complex projects into doable steps with realistic timelines.
prompt:
Create a realistic project plan that breaks down this project into manageable tasks with clear owners and deadlines.

PROJECT OVERVIEW:
- Project Name: [PROJECT TITLE]
- End Goal: [WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE]
- Deadline: [FINAL DATE]
- Budget: $[AVAILABLE FUNDS]
- Priority Level: [HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]

SCOPE:
- What's Included: [DELIVERABLES]
- What's NOT Included: [OUT OF SCOPE]
- Dependencies: [WHAT WE NEED FROM OTHERS]
- Assumptions: [WHAT WE'RE COUNTING ON]

TEAM:
- Project Lead: [NAME/ROLE]
- Team Members: [NAMES AND SKILLS]
- Hours Available: [TIME EACH PERSON CAN COMMIT]
- External Resources: [CONTRACTORS/VENDORS]

CONSTRAINTS:
- Hard Deadlines: [UNMOVABLE DATES]
- Resource Limits: [PEOPLE/MONEY/TIME]
- Technical Limits: [SYSTEM/TOOL CONSTRAINTS]
- Approval Needed: [WHO MUST SIGN OFF]

RISKS:
- Known Issues: [PROBLEMS WE SEE COMING]
- Past Problems: [WHAT WENT WRONG BEFORE]
- Contingency Plans: [BACKUP OPTIONS]

SUCCESS METRICS:
- Measurable Goals: [SPECIFIC TARGETS]
- Quality Standards: [MINIMUM ACCEPTABLE]
- Stakeholder Expectations: [WHAT THEY WANT]

Create:
1. Project phases with milestones
2. Task breakdown (work breakdown structure)
3. Timeline with dependencies mapped
4. Resource allocation plan
5. Risk mitigation strategies
6. Communication plan
7. Budget breakdown
8. Quality checkpoints
9. Stakeholder update schedule
10. Project kickoff agenda

Also provide:
- Weekly status report template
- Issue escalation process
- Change request procedure
- Lessons learned framework

Make timelines realistic with buffer time. Show critical path clearly.
